game.name: Lilialette's Hustle: Getting My Hands Dirty to Save My Guild
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lilialette loves life as a guild receptionist, but between the upcoming guild merger and budget cuts, she might be getting fired soon! Help Lilialette get into gear and take on quests to turn her F-Rank guild into a bustling hub for adventurers... and save her dream job, of course!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lilialette loves life as a guild receptionist, but between the upcoming guild merger and budget cuts, she might be getting fired soon! Help Lilialette get into gear and take on quests to turn her F-Rank guild into a bustling hub for adventurers... and save her dream job, of course!

reviewHighlights.text: 배급사 패치 있음 모자이크 없음 라투디 있음 음성은 부분만 있음 아무 엔딩만 보면 메인 메뉴에 있는 회상방에서 CG개방 가능 빠르게 엔딩을 보면, 베드 엔딩인 납치 엔딩 정도에서 엔딩을 볼텐데, 엔딩을 본 다음에 회상방으로 가면 CG 언락을 가능하다. 베드 엔딩을 봐도...
